definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: The eggs are packed in cartons with beehives lined with shake-proof paper board.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋要用带蜂房孔，外衬防震纸板的纸箱包装。

sentences.english: Scientists have noted that elephants tend to avoid trees with beehives.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们指出大象往往避开有蜂房的树木。

sentences.english: The hives have since been moved to nearby pastures in hopes the bees will return.
sentences.chinese: 所有蜂箱已挪到附近的牧场，以便蜜蜂能回到蜂房内。

sentences.english: Honeycomb style module of drift chambers produced for tracking high energy particles was described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用于确定高能粒子径迹的蜂房状漂移室组件。
蜂蜜树村和所有的蜂房。

sentences.english: Remember to destroy every single structure in each Hive complex.
sentences.chinese: 记住要摧毁每个结构在每个蜂房复杂。

sentences.english: The naughty boy was chased by the bees because he destroyed the honeycomb.
sentences.chinese: 这个淘气的男孩因为捣毁了蜂房而被蜜蜂追赶。

sentences.english: The hive is full of beeswax.
The queen bee never leaves the hive.
Missis Obama said 2 beehives will provide honey.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马太太说有两个蜂房提供蜂蜜。

sentences.english: There were beekeepers who found their hives empty this spring.
sentences.chinese: 这春季好多养蜂人发现它们的蜂房是空的。

sentences.english: Whoa, that Invid Hive is a lot bigger than I thought it would be.
sentences.chinese: 哇，那个因维德蜂房比我想象的要大得多。

sentences.english: Kami will die inside the hive.
Teleporting via a movement chamber or hive cause the player to uncloak .
sentences.chinese: 传送经运动庭或蜂房造成玩家来揭露。

sentences.english: The worker-bees after a hard day in the field return to the hive.
sentences.chinese: 工蜂在野外辛勤劳动一天之后返回蜂房。

sentences.english: In their hives, they are organized according to their function.
sentences.chinese: 在蜂房中，它们各司其职，形成紧密的组织。

definition: cicada slough/fig. to free oneself/to extricate oneself from
